mapper.select: SELECT t.deal_serial, t.deal_name, t3.name AS lessor, t5.name AS renter, t.fk_renter_id AS renterId, group_concat(t1.id SEPARATOR ',') AS resourceId, group_concat(concat(t3.name, t1.park, t1.build_no, '号楼', t1.build_level, '层', t1.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS location, sum(t1.resource_area) AS resourceArea, group_concat(t7.name SEPARATOR ',') AS houseUsage, t3.name AS agencyName, timestampdiff(MONTH, t.start_time, t.end_time) AS rentMonth, (timestampdiff(MONTH, t.start_time, t.end_time) * t1.real_rent_charge * t1.resource_area) AS monthRentCharge, CASE t.pay_type WHEN 1 THEN '一月一付' WHEN 3 THEN '一季度一付' WHEN 6 THEN '半年一付' WHEN 12 THEN '一年一付' END AS payType, t.pay_type AS payTypeCode, t.free_rent_month, t.deal_type AS dealTypeCode, CASE t.deal_type WHEN 1 THEN '协商出租' WHEN 2 THEN '一事一议' WHEN 3 THEN '挂靠' END AS dealType, t.is_new_rent AS rentTypeCode, CASE t.is_new_rent WHEN 1 THEN '新签' WHEN 2 THEN '续签' END AS rentType, t8.deposit AS deposit, t1.origin_rent_charge, t1.guide_rent_charge, t.deal_exist_status AS dealExistStatusCode, CASE t.deal_exist_status WHEN 1 THEN '正常' WHEN 2 THEN '已到期' WHEN 3 THEN '正常终止' WHEN 4 THEN '提前结束' END AS dealExistStatus, t.deal_review_status AS dealReviewStatusCode, CASE t.deal_review_status WHEN 1 THEN '未审核' WHEN 2 THEN '审核通过' WHEN 3 THEN '审核不通过' END AS dealReviewStatus, t.start_time, t.end_time FROM deal t LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t11 ON t11.fk_deal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t1 ON t11.fk_house_resource_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_assets t2 ON t1.fk_house_assets_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t3 ON t2.fk_agency_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN dic_assets_co t4 ON t2.fk_own_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN renter t5 ON t.fk_renter_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN land_assets t6 ON t2.fk_land_assets_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN dic_house_usage t7 ON t2.fk_house_usage = t7.id LEFT JOIN money_deposit_must t8 ON t8.fk_deal_id = t.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.id, t.deal_serial, t.deal_type AS dealTypeCode, CASE t.deal_type WHEN 1 THEN '协商出租' WHEN 2 THEN '一事一议' WHEN 3 THEN '挂靠' END AS dealType, t.pay_type AS payTypeCode, CASE t.pay_type WHEN 1 THEN '一月一付' WHEN 3 THEN '一季度一付' WHEN 6 THEN '半年一付' WHEN 12 THEN '一年一付' END AS payType, group_concat(CONCAT(t3.name,t1.park,ifnull(t1.build_no,'/'),'栋',ifnull(t1.build_level,'/'),'层',ifnull(t1.build_room,'')) SEPARATOR ',') AS location, t2.fk_own_id AS lessorId, t4.name AS lessor, t.fk_renter_id AS renterId, t5.name AS renter, t.rent_month, t.free_rent_month, t.is_new_rent AS isNewRentCode, CASE t.is_new_rent WHEN 1 THEN '新签' WHEN 2 THEN '续签' END AS isNewRent, t.is_have_discount AS isHaveDiscountCode, CASE t.is_have_discount WHEN 1 THEN '有优惠' WHEN 2 THEN '无优惠' END AS isHaveDiscount, t.deal_exist_status AS dealExistStatusCode, CASE t.deal_exist_status WHEN 1 THEN '进行中' WHEN 2 THEN '已删除' WHEN 3 THEN '正常终止' WHEN 4 THEN '提前结束' END AS dealExistStatus, t.deal_review_status AS dealReviewStatusCode, CASE t.deal_review_status WHEN 1 THEN '未审核' WHEN 2 THEN '通过审核' WHEN 3 THEN '未通过审核' END AS dealReviewStatus, t.start_time, t.end_time FROM deal t LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t11 ON t11.fk_deal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t1 ON t11.fk_house_resource_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_assets t2 ON t1.fk_house_assets_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t3 ON t2.fk_agency_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN dic_assets_co t4 ON t2.fk_own_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN renter t5 ON t.fk_renter_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN land_assets t6 ON t2.fk_land_assets_id = t6.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.deal_review_status = 1 GROUP BY t.id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.deal_name, t.deal_serial, group_concat(concat(t3.name, t1.park, t1.build_no, '号楼', t1.build_level, '层', t1.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS resourceName, t.fk_renter_id AS renterId, group_concat(t1.id SEPARATOR ',') AS resourceId, t3.name AS lessor, t5.name AS renter, concat(t6.assets_location, t1.build_no, t1.build_level, t1.build_room) AS location, timestampdiff(DAY ,now(),t.end_time) AS lastDay, t.start_time, t.end_time FROM deal t LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t11 ON t11.fk_deal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t1 ON t11.fk_house_resource_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_assets t2 ON t1.fk_house_assets_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t3 ON t2.fk_agency_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN dic_assets_co t4 ON t2.fk_own_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN renter t5 ON t.fk_renter_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN land_assets t6 ON t2.fk_land_assets_id = t6.id WHERE date_add(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY) >= t.end_time GROUP BY t.id
ORDER BY t.created_time DESC
ORDER BY t.created_time ASC
) a where a.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.id AS i, t.fk_deal_id AS id, concat(date_format(t1.start_time, '%Y年%m月%d日'), '-保证金') AS mustReason, date_format(t1.start_time, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS mustDate, t.deposit AS money, CASE t1.deal_review_status WHEN 2 THEN '正常' ELSE '未启用' END AS payStatus, concat('保证金') AS moneyType FROM money_deposit_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id UNION ALL SELECT t.id AS i, t.fk_deal_id AS id, concat(date_format(t.rent_date, '%Y年%m月%d日'), '-租金') AS mustReason, date_format(t.rent_date, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS mustDate, t.must_charge AS money, CASE t.is_enable WHEN 2 THEN '正常' ELSE '未启用' END AS payStatus, concat('租金') AS moneyType FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id UNION ALL SELECT t.id AS i, t.fk_deal_id AS id, concat(date_format(now(), '%Y年'), '前-往年欠款') AS mustReason, date_format(now(), '%Y年') AS mustDate, t.arrears AS money, CASE t1.deal_review_status WHEN 2 THEN '正常' ELSE '未启用' END AS payStatus, concat('往年欠款') AS moneyType FROM money_arrears_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id) a WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.i ASC;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.cert_no AS certNo, concat(date_format(t2.start_time, '%Y年%m月%d日'), '-保证金') AS transReason, date_format(t.money_date, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS moneyDate, t.money AS money, concat('保证金') AS moneyType, t.remark FROM money_real_flow t LEFT JOIN money_deposit_must t1 ON t.fk_must_money_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN deal t2 ON t1.fk_deal_id = t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{id} UNION ALL
SELECT t.cert_no AS certNo, concat(date_format(t1.rent_date, '%Y年%m月%d日'), '-租金') AS transReason, date_format(t.money_date, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS moneyDate, t.money AS money, concat('租金') AS moneyType, t.remark FROM money_real_flow t LEFT JOIN money_rent_must t1 ON t.fk_must_money_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN deal t2 ON t1.fk_deal_id = t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{id} UNION ALL
SELECT t.cert_no AS certNo, concat(date_format(now(), '%Y年'), '-前往年欠款') AS transReason, date_format(t.money_date, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS moneyDate, t.money AS money, concat('往年欠款') AS moneyType, t.remark FROM money_real_flow t LEFT JOIN money_arrears_must t1 ON t.fk_must_money_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN deal t2 ON t1.fk_deal_id = t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{id} ) a
SELECT t.real_money * t1.resource_area FROM mid_deal_house t LEFT JOIN estate.house_resource t1 ON t.fk_house_resource_id = t1.id WHERE t.fk_deal_id = #{id}
SELECT t1.fk_house_resource_id FROM deal t LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t1 ON t1.fk_deal_id = t.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
